availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Granville St. John (Knox County, Kentucky, mechanic)

body.p: Knox County, Kentucky, mechanic. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Arthur St. John. Father of Jane St. John, Ransom St. John, and Mary St. John. Plasterer in Knox County, Kentucky, in 1850. Mechanic in Knox County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, p. 329A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Flat Lick, p. 165.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, District 93, p. 387A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994044, Knox County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 0523.
"Granville St. John (1812-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial 27624587, accessed September 6, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27624587.
